features: USE THEM ANYWHERE: SinkSuds were designed to be taken anywhere and used anywhere; they are a travel must have! Wash clothes on-the-go no matter your amenities – sink, bathtub, or washer. Phosphate free and biodegradable.

SINKSUDS, IT’S SIMPLE: Simply mix the packet in water, wash your garments, and hang dry. Use 1 packet for 2-3 garments and 4 packets for a full load of laundry. Includes 16 unscented, 0.25 fluid ounce packets.
PERFECT SIZE: This portable laundry soap is premeasured for your convenience. We created these laundry detergent packets to be TSA compliant and fit right in your carry-on or backpack.
WASH ANYTHING: Our liquid laundry detergent can be used on all types of clothes and won’t stretch, shrink, or cause fading. It can even be used with delicates or baby clothing.

A TRAVEL ESSENTIAL: SinkSuds is the perfect travel size toiletry no matter what type of adventure you go on. Use it for vacation, business trips, cruises, backpacking, camping, or any extended hotel stay.
body.description: Will not shrink, stretch or fade clothing. Phosphate-free and biodegradable. TSA COMPLIANT: Meets the 3-1-1 TSA guidelines for carry-ons, and easily fits in your backpack, gym bag, duffel, purse or diaper bag. Perfect for vacation, business trips, cruises, backpacking adventures, international or domestic travel, or any extended hotel stay, etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PREMEASURED + EASY TO USE Simply add 1 packet to wash 2-3 garments in a sink or 3-4 packets for a resort sized stacking washer. Can also be used in sinks, bathtubs, collapsible basins, or washing machines. ALL FABRIC TYPES SinkSuds is safe enough for all water temperatures and fabrics and will not shrink, stretch, or fade clothing; it's even gentle enough for use with delicates or baby clothing! TSA COMPLIANT Meets 3-1-1 TSA guidelines for carry-ons, and fits in your backpack, gym bag, duffel, purse or diaper bag. Perfect for vacation, business trips, cruises, backpacking adventures, international/domestic travel, or extended hotel stay.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So glad I found this product! Bought for a 14 day trip to Europe with carryons. After years of washing my clothes with bar soap or hotel soaps while traveling and not feeling like my clothes got clean, this stuff is amazing!! Felt like clothes had been washed in a machine. No residue. Clothes weren't stiff. Easy to pack and get thru TSA. Highly recommended for long trips with limited clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Loved the individual packets, so easy to take for travel. Only downside, when I received it, seemed 1 packet leaked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The packaging leaked and was a mess. However, the product works very well and has a nice, light scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very well and easy to rinse out of clothes
reviews.reviewText: Took many packets with us to Europe and this cleaner easily took out the smelly quality of travel clothes that had been on us well over 24 hours. Easy to rinse out, too. Very happy with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I take packets on every trip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First off this smells nice and clean, but I only know that because the entire package was covered in soap when I opened it. I got everything cleaned off, but have 3 empty packets. I also was only sent 12 (and 2 stoppers) when I purposely ordered the 16 pack for a trip.Thankfully everything else in my order was individually wrapped otherwise it would all be soapy.Will update the number of stars when I actually have a chance to use the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sink washing
reviews.reviewText: These are great to have for travel. I have used them to do hotel sink laundry, and they are very effective without leaving any residue on a variety of fabrics. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t impress me unfortunately. And I was so excited! Bummer.
reviews.reviewText: Got a pack of these for a trip to India. Concept seems great! Even comes with 2 sink plugs, and they were perfect.Maybe it was me, maybe it was the water? The suds disappeared after 20 seconds. And then it just seemed ineffective. Listen, I probably did something wrong. Who knows.Bottom line: next time I would just get a tiny Nalgene bottle (10ml?) and fill it with detergent. 🤷 Less plastic waste and I know exactly what my detergent does or doesn’t do. Sure, regular detergent will do a number on my skin, but this stuff simply left me wanting for more. I let my hotel do the laundry, which ofc ended up costing 💰, no surprise. Bummer. But I didn’t want half washed clothes. I want undeniably clean. So maybe that’s on me for buying something meant for sensitive skin. Was gonna give 3/5 but I’ll add a star, because I don’t think you can make good (very effective) detergent that’s safe for sensitive skin. Feels mutually exclusive, so fine - 4/5 it is.YMMV but I won’t buy this again unfortunately. Good luck!
